text: Villa San Pietro (Santu Pèdru) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Cagliari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 2,107 people lived there. Its area is 39.89 km². It is 37 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Communes of the Metropolitan City of Cagliari
title: Villa San Pietro
